Text:
Brilliant. Many thanks.
I will seed to at least 10:1 in appreciation.
Be well. T.

So many bands that I've never heard of.
You just can't beat the stuff from 1979-1983. 
Just kick back and enjoy the times.
Thanks again for all your hard work posting these obscure albums.

dragonbandit314, thanks so very much for helping seed my torrents. and thank you all for taking the time and making comments. It gives me reason to post more music if I see that people are still interested in expanding their collection, at no cost! lol

Hi 80z. I have always tried to help those who provide a superb service, such as yourself.
As stated earlier, I am aware of the effort you make. I did do it, not easy.
Be well and keep up the good work.
Thanks
